item.title: 2D array using pointers and manually allocated memory
item.description: 2D Arrays 2d arrays can be allocated memory with malloc/calloc using the following methods First we declare a typedef for a function that we need to initialise the 2-d array with. This also assumes the size of 2-d array is known first. typedef type type_array[LENGTH]; Here, type is any builtin type or a struct type or a typedef type and LENGTH is the is the number of columns in the 2D array.
